data.name: EverQuest : Attack of the Unseen Bundle
data.detailed_description:
Leap into EverQuest in style with your very own Grassland Tiger mount, a powerful XP potion, and a bundle of valuable armor and jewelry!

This bundle contains:
  • Consigned Complete Armor Bundle
  • Consigned Complete Jewelry Bundle
  • Bottle of Adventure III Experience Potion
  • Grassland Tiger Mount
data.about_the_game:
Leap into EverQuest in style with your very own Grassland Tiger mount, a powerful XP potion, and a bundle of valuable armor and jewelry!

This bundle contains:

data.short_description: Leap into EverQuest in style with your very own Grassland Tiger mount, a powerful XP potion, and a bundle of valuable armor and jewelry!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP, Windows Vista, or Windows 7
  • Processor: Pentium® II 400 equivalent or greater
  • Memory:512 MB RAM
  • Graphics:NVIDIA Ti 4800 or ATI 9800
  • DirectX®:9.0
  • Hard Drive:10 GB HD space
  • Sound:DirectX Compatible Sound Card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS:Windows XP, Windows Vista, or Windows 7
  • Processor:Pentium® 4 equivalent or greater
  • Memory:2 GB RAM
  • Graphics:NVIDIA 6800 or ATI x1800
  • DirectX®:9.0
  • Hard Drive:10 GB HD space
  • Sound:DirectX compatible Sound Card
